Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>夢のフォルス<White>か…… 色々なフォルスがあるな……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Force of Dreams<White>... There sure are many types of Force...

Entry.JapaneseText: 制御できなくって、あんな風に人を 巻き込んじゃうようなフォルスは危険だネ。
Entry.EnglishText: A Force that gets people caught up like that when you can't control it is dangerous.

Entry.JapaneseText: あのままじゃ頭痛が完治する事も なさそうですね……
Entry.EnglishText: And if this keeps up, then his headache will never get better, either...

Entry.JapaneseText: たまに来て、つき合ってやるのが 人助けってもんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, stopping by to see him every once in a while should be the help he needs.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当は楽しかったんでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: I take it you had fun?

Entry.JapaneseText: なっ……おまえだって 楽しんでたじゃねえかよっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wha... Weren't you having fun too?!
